content.title: Anastomotic Technique
content.definition: End-to-side preferred. Sharp needle, monofilament suture. Avoid tension, rotation, or excessive clamping.
content.statement: Anastomotic Technique is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Procedures that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
